summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 DODGE JOURNEY. WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED, THE POWER STEERING RETURN HOSE RUPTURED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO O'CCONORS CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM (LOCATED AT 22513 M-129, PICKFORD, MI 49774, (800) 800-7192) TO BE REPAIRED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V273000 (STEERING). THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE WAS NOT DISCLOSED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 81,638.
